headline: Roddy Ricch Tops Two Billboard Charts
abstract: “The Box,” by the 21-year-old rapper, held off a comeback single by Bieber thanks to success on streaming platforms.
lead_paragraph: Roddy Ricch, a 21-year-old melodic rapper from Compton, Calif., held off a brand-new comeback single from Justin Bieber to take the top spot this week on the Billboard Hot 100 singles chart, giving him a No. 1 song to go with his second nonconsecutive week atop the Billboard 200 album chart.
keywords: Please Excuse Me for Being Antisocial (Album)
